thread.title: 'Tangled' sequel trailer: Rapunzel's hair grows back
thread.title_full: 'Tangled' sequel trailer: Rapunzel's hair grows back

author: USA TODAY
title: 'Tangled' sequel trailer: Rapunzel's hair grows back
text:
'Tangled' sequel trailer: Rapunzel's hair grows back Carly Mallenbaum , USA TODAY 6:58 p.m. ET Jan. 15, 2017 
Rapunzel, voiced by Mandy Moore, has long, magical hair in most of the movie 'Tangled.' (Photo: Disney Enterprises) 
It’s the climax of Disney’s Tangled : Rapunzel’s yards of golden hair are dramatically cut by love interest Flynn Rider, aka Eugene. 
So it may come as a surprise that in a sequel to the animated movie, Tangled: Before Ever After , Rapunzel’s magical tresses have grown back. See for yourself in a new trailer for the TV movie that has this description: "You may think you know Rapunzel’s story, but find out what happens before ever after." 
The follow-up to the 2010 film will hit Disney Channel in March, right before Tangled: The Series does. Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi are returning to voice Rapunzel and Eugene. 
Before Before Ever After , Disney released the short film Tangled Ever After in 2012, which showed Rapunzel and Eugene getting married . Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2jNLB8z Most Popular
